channel.title: 2024 on Leipzig Gophers
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 on Leipzig Gophers

item.description: Go turned 15 years in 2024, our meetup will turn six and just as Go we continue to grow. Go‚Äôs user base has more than tripled in the past five years, making it one of the fastest growing languages. From its beginnings just fifteen years ago, Go has become a top 10 language and the language of the modern cloud. – 15years Our year summarized: we organized eight events in 2024, plus seven open tech lunches and grew from 577 to 695 members - big üôè to Basislager Coworking for providing a great venue for many of our events (#40, #41, #44, #46) we collaborated with two local companies again: Gridfuse (#43) and CHECK24 (#42, #45) ‚Äî thanks for being such great hosts!
